channel.title: Lol help
channel.description:
Yeah, im new here....i spent all day today trying different methods of getting my own server... just wanted to know if someone could write up a tutorial on how to set up a server that is just me...maybe one that could be accessed by my brother on my home network???
i have no intention of putting it online....
if someone can help that would be great
Regards Saykrus
